about_the_game:
The protagonist of this work Yuwen flame accidentally traversed to a mysterious campus. Wake up Yuwen flame met high cold beautiful Li Xue, cute cute sister little sauce, sexy charming Hou Meiling and other students, they are from different universe of people, everything seems like a dream, but it is true. In order to return to their respective world, the principal of the school stipulated that students could only pass campus exams before leaving the school.

This is a role-playing game in which players play the role of a high school traveler, Yuwenflame, and return to the original world through learning skills, developing attributes, card fighting, collecting cards, and interactive gameplay.

Play:

Learning: Through XX days of campus study, learn the attributes of the corresponding discipline, and each attribute will become one card according to the card battle
Combat: Play card battles with NPCS, reward them when you win, draw their cards randomly.
And the cards drawn can be replaced by the cards of the corresponding discipline.
Exams: Take a test every 30 days, which is a card battle with teachers.
detailed_description:
Please install free DLC

Please install free DLC or the game content is abnormal.


About the Game

The protagonist of this work Yuwen flame accidentally traversed to a mysterious campus. Wake up Yuwen flame met high cold beautiful Li Xue, cute cute sister little sauce, sexy charming Hou Meiling and other students, they are from different universe of people, everything seems like a dream, but it is true. In order to return to their respective world, the principal of the school stipulated that students could only pass campus exams before leaving the school. This is a role-playing game in which players play the role of a high school traveler, Yuwenflame, and return to the original world through learning skills, developing attributes, card fighting, collecting cards, and interactive gameplay. Play: Learning: Through XX days of campus study, learn the attributes of the corresponding discipline, and each attribute will become one card according to the card battle Combat: Play card battles with NPCS, reward them when you win, draw their cards randomly. And the cards drawn can be replaced by the cards of the corresponding discipline. Exams: Take a test every 30 days, which is a card battle with teachers.
name: 龙傲天的多元宇宙

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: This is a role-playing game in which players play the role of a high school traveler, Yuwenflame, and return to the original world through learning skills, developing attributes, card fighting, collecting cards, and interactive gameplay.
